org.nd4j.linalg.api.parallel.tasks

Interface Task<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The return type of the Task, Void if no return type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCPUAccumulationTask, BaseCPUAction, BaseCPUIndexAccumulationTask, BaseCPUScalarOpAction, BaseCPUTask, BaseCPUTransformOpAction, BaseTask, CPUAccumulationAlongDimensionTask, CPUAccumulations1dAction, CPUAccumulationTask, CPUAccumulationViaTensorTask, CpuBroadcastOp, CPUCol2ImTask, CPUIm2ColTask, CPUIndexAccumulationAlongDimensionTask, CPUIndexAccumulations1dAction, CPUIndexAccumulationTask, CPUIndexAccumulationViaTensorTask, CPUScalarOpAction, CPUScalarOpViaTensorAction, CPUTransformAlongDimensionTask, CPUTransformOpAction, CPUTransformOpViaTensorTask

    public interface Task<V>
extends java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>
    A Task implements/defines the method of execution of an Op An Op defines what is to be done A Task defines how that op is executed (for example, it might be split up and parallelized) A task also has methods for blockind and non-blocking (asynchronous) execution.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V blockUntilComplete()
      Assuming invokeAsync() has been called, block until the execution completes
      V call()
      Compute the result immediately, in the current thread
      void invokeAsync()
      Schedule for asyncronous execution; returns immediately
      V invokeBlocking()
      Schedule for execution, and block until completion
